notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: J.G.Z. and H.Y.J. designed the study, J.G.Z. and Z.X.G. performed the experiments, J.G.Z. and T.T.L. analyzed the results, J.G.Z. wrote the manuscript. T.-T.L., L.Z., L.-G.M. and H.-Y.J. edited the manuscript. Y.-N.Z. and L.-G.M. reviewed the manuscript. H.Y.J. supervised the study.
